org.apache.streams.twitter.api

Interface SuggestedUsers

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Twitter

    @Remoteable(path="https://api.twitter.com/1.1/users")
public interface SuggestedUsers
    Interface for /users methods.
    See Also:
    https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<SuggestedUserCategory> categories(String lang)
      Access to Twitter’s suggested user list.
      List<User> members(String slug)
      Access the users in a given category of the Twitter suggested user list and return their most recent status if they are not a protected user.
      SuggestedUserCategory suggestions(String slug, String lang)
      Access the users in a given category of the Twitter suggested user list.

    • Method Detail

      • categories

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/suggestions.json")
List<SuggestedUserCategory> categories(@QueryIfNE(value="lang")
                                                                                                               String lang)
        Access to Twitter’s suggested user list. This returns the list of suggested user categories.
        Parameters:
        lang - Restricts the suggested categories to the requested language. The language must be specified by the appropriate two letter ISO 639-1 representation.
        Returns:
        List[SuggestedUserCategory]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-users-suggestions

      • suggestions

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/suggestions/{slug}.json")
SuggestedUserCategory suggestions(@Path(value="slug")
                                                                                                                 String slug,
                                                                                                                 @QueryIfNE(value="lang")
                                                                                                                 String lang)
        Access the users in a given category of the Twitter suggested user list. It is recommended that applications cache this data for no more than one hour.
        Returns:
        SuggestedUserCategory
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-users-suggestions-slug

      • members

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/suggestions/{slug}/members.json")
List<User> members(@Path(value="slug")
                                                                                                          String slug)
        Access the users in a given category of the Twitter suggested user list and return their most recent status if they are not a protected user.
        Returns:
        List[User]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-users-suggestions-slug
